import './index.css' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function App() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", date: "", message: "" }) const handleInput = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } const onsubmits = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(user) } return

Enquiry Form

FIRST Name
LAST NAME
EMAIL
PHONE NUMBER
DATE
}
